message.content:
We first locate the key numbers from each statement and then compute the ratios as follows.

──────────────────────────────
Step 1. Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio

Definition:
  Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio = (Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities) / (Net Profit)

From the cash flow statement:
 • Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = –224,133.22  
 • From the income statement: Net Profit = 1,193,771.08  

Thus, the ratio is:
  –224,133.22 / 1,193,771.08 ≈ –0.1877  
Rounded to two decimals, this is –0.19

──────────────────────────────
Step 2. Current Assets Turnover Ratio

Definition:
  Current Assets Turnover Ratio = (Main Business Revenue) / (Average Total Current Assets)

From the income statement:
 • Main Business Revenue = 5,695,115.02

From the balance sheet:
 • Beginning current assets = 8,000,000.00  
 • Ending current assets = 9,963,057.95

Calculate the average:
  (8,000,000.00 + 9,963,057.95) / 2 = 8,981,528.975

Thus, the ratio is:
  5,695,115.02 / 8,981,528.975 ≈ 0.634  
Rounded to two decimals, this is 0.63

──────────────────────────────
Step 3. Quick Ratio

Definition:
  Quick Ratio = (Quick Assets) / (Current Liabilities)
Quick Assets are current assets that can be quickly converted into cash. They typically include Cash on Hand, Bank Deposits, Interest Receivable, and Accounts Receivable (i.e. excluding Inventory).

From the balance sheet:
 • Cash on Hand = 3,730,866.78  
 • Bank Deposits = 3,938,781.80  
 • Interest Receivable = 10,811.11  
 • Accounts Receivable = 1,562,598.26

Sum these to get Quick Assets:
  3,730,866.78 + 3,938,781.80 = 7,669,648.58  
  + 10,811.11 = 7,680,459.69  
  + 1,562,598.26 = 9,243,057.95

For Current Liabilities, from the balance sheet:
 • Total Current Liabilities = 829,755.77

Thus, the quick ratio is:
  9,243,057.95 / 829,755.77 ≈ 11.14

──────────────────────────────
Final Answer in Specified Format

{
  "solution": {
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "-0.19",
    "Current Assets Turnover Ratio": "0.63",
    "Quick Ratio": "11.14"
  }
}
